snippet: A new Vietnamese decree appears to limit the ability of people to share news stories critical of the government.
abstract: American officials criticize Vietnamese government for its new limits on political dissent on Internet, citing decree that appears to limit ability of people to share news stories critical of government.
lead_paragraph: A new Vietnamese decree appears to limit the ability of people to share news stories critical of the government.

headline.main: U.S. Denounces Vietnam’s New Limits on Dissent on Internet
headline.print_headline: U.S. Denounces Vietnam’s New Limits on Dissent on Internet
